Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 32nd overall pick, by St. Louis in 2018...
Traded from St. Louis to Miami on 5/21/2018 (Going to STL: CF Henry Ramos. Going to MIA: 3B William Shank)...
Injured on 8/31/2018 with a Strained Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...
Injured on 8/24/2019 with a Pulled Thigh Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from Miami to Pittsburgh on 2/21/2020 (Going to MIA: P Walter Schutte. Going to PIT: 2B William Shank)...
Injured on 5/7/2021 with a Pulled Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 9/6/2021, off Tim Lincecum (ARI)...
Traded from Pittsburgh to Oakland on 2/3/2022 (Going to PIT: LF Anthony Santander. Going to OAK: P Enrique Frau, LF Ross Kivett, 3B William Shank)...
Hit first career homerun on 7/2/2022, off Walter Schutte (LAA)...
1/31/2025: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2026: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
1/31/2027: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,292,857 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/12/2028 to a 3-year deal worth $896,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/2028, hitting .520 with 4 HR, 13 RBI...
Released by Cleveland on 5/29/2028...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 9/4/2028 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Released by Philadelphia on 10/2/2028...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 5/1/2029 to a minor league contract...
